model

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Student
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity(name="STUDENT")
public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Persistant JPA Entity Class

    Represents a student

    Follows the Model-View-Controller software pattern. Because of field and method visibilities, only getter methods can be accessed. To create or alter instances of this class, use StudentController.

    Author:
    Jan Cardenas, Leonardo Neves
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
